811EF33C715E4924B05039A17E0B710E.description: Follow acceptable formats for technical writing and professional presentations.

Adhere to established conventions of written, oral, and electronic communications (grammar,

DD387961DD274F25823A7ED4E7C2286E.description: Communicate effectively with an audience based on audience characteristics.

2688AC0C3FF840008BE5641D925893DA.description: Create logic using a programming language.

completes a task.

Describe where a count starts and where a count stops/repeats on a modulus asynchronous
counter

Analyze and/or design up, down, and modulus asynchronous counters using discrete D and
J/K flip-flops.

0E312AFB42F143BB8180236945596883.description:

Describe the advantages and disadvantages of counters using an asynchronous counter
design or synchronous counter design.

circuits, data synchronizers, shift registers, and frequency dividers.

F1631A9E5E2047A4B9A738348B918472.description:

Select and apply components in a design to produce a desired waveform, frequency, period,

4424597FD05946F98BC00ED2EAF3E8CB.description: Clock signals trigger events in circuits.

circuit design software (CDS).

Properly solder and de-solder components to printed circuit boards according to best
practices.

607440A52D1E4F3B98BB18B51243413E.description: Troubleshoot circuits (mechanics of circuit and logic of circuit).

3 Select and apply the appropriate components, tools, and technology when creating or characterizing a
design.

ED0013FB73994C8FA1429AFACBD36953.description:

and test designs on devices, such as a Field Programmable Gated Array (FPGA), reducing
the time needed in design.

Select the correct current-limiting resistor and/or properly wire both common cathode and
common anode seven-segment displays.

schematic symbol, and/or data sheet.

Know that common logic gates are designed to fit in Integrated Circuits (ICs) for easier use in
design. These ICs are most often found in two styles: Small Scale Integration (SSI) and
Medium Scale Integration (MSI).

3F5F9C6267624B5BADCD279BD873EF07.description: Use mathematical processes to convert any value between any two number systems.

60885A566F28420F867D4841EBD56BD3.description: Solve complex calculations using appropriate notation.

Foundations in Mathematics and Science: All digital circuits are created from base 2 mathematics. Knowledge of number systems and mathematical
relationships of analog circuits are fundamental to understanding and creating circuits.

C727BB4EC7704793A9AF9A04E3CDE670.description: Technical Knowledge and Skills: Every career field requires technical literacy and career-specific knowledge and skills to support professional practice.

A183F311D8AA469F9A0CE4CA458E0F41.description: Identify, test, and implement possible solutions to a problem using a computer.

AC559F163E82475B9899CFCF02BE4721.description: Develop an algorithm (step-by step-process) for solving a problem.

5BF6D810FEE546C98ECEA786F48F7128.description: Analyze data and identify patterns through modeling and simulation.

230BA5B82D3C491E8186BF7441D4ED21.description: Use modeling and simulation to represent and understand natural phenomena.

6C6030C023444F9D9B22F17CADE33513.description: Interact with content-specific models and simulation to support learning and research.

5818201E6FE846E9AE4799FD5DA50372.description: Apply computational thinking to generalize and solve a problem using a computer.

B76E6A81DC044D3F9DD3C7C1E5C61999.description: Produce a physical model using electronic components.

9126BAA547314999AA16A94CB2DE79BA.description: Demonstrate use of hand tools and shop tools.

4DA7686473F9418DB4579C14F5B7968A.description:
Describe a process to build a physical object based on a conceptual communication such as

372480C7573D4E0998305BB6BF8E39C4.description: Construct physical objects using hand tools and shop tools.

98BBC59E21F449EA9961AE365916BFCA.description:
Explain and differentiate between the accuracy and precision of a measurement or measuring
device.

2429B752050B49A7882010D3C6EA1FED.description:
Using a variety of measuring devices, measure and report quantities accurately and to a precision
appropriate for the purpose.

49EB8BECB08B4E31885866CBDCAFA4CF.description: Engineering Tools and Technology: The practice of engineering requires the application of mathematical principles and common engineering tools, techniques, and technologies.

0C5848B2416540CF9C462A0368EC8D3C.description:
Explain that there are often multiple viable solutions and no obvious best solution. Tradeoffs
must be considered and evaluated consistently throughout an engineering design process.

49DB5F796CCE46F3923B7AF0AA5A9297.description: Select a solution path from many options to successfully address a problem or opportunity.

5A06D49F730646D1A03A7F3B730047C4.description:
Define various types of models that can be used to represent products, processes, or
designs, such as physical prototypes, mathematical models, and virtual representations.
Explain the purpose and appropriate use of each.

9E4EB4D2CE0B4B92828EACB29CC2B263.description:
Describe the use of a model to accurately represent the key aspects of a physical system.
Include the identification of constraints, such as cost, time, or expertise that may influence the
selection of a model.

5E3C8C9D521D421689E47D584543008B.description:
Choose and develop models to represent design alternatives and scenarios in order to generate data to
inform decision making, test alternatives, and demonstrate solutions.

4E30BF63C7394B7AACB5DBB73C478381.description:
Represent concepts using a variety of visual tools, such as sketches, graphs, and charts, to
communicate details of an idea.

3A8048056B4147FA8EA451501413F8E5.description:
Identify and define visual, functional, and structural design requirements with realistic
constraints, against which solution alternatives can be evaluated.

8949D57222A546B98FB2ACE8A3B9A2F0.description:
Explain the importance of carefully and specifically defining a problem or opportunity, design
criteria, and constraints, to develop successful design solutions.

21451F4223A145F88A62C71D5C624F6C.description: Synthesize an ill-formed problem into a meaningful, well-defined problem.

0810B59618BC44ACB2492AEAF0944E3E.description: Find relevant data in credible sources such as literature, databases, and policy documents.

02048AE09F21436F88FC611522A0518D.description:
Collect, analyze, and interpret information relevant to the problem or opportunity at hand to support
engineering decisions.

27492637623A4BE58BC249A2C9D33A89.description: Document a design process in an engineering notebook according to best practices.

B5F8A2FAF6124B0B888C7D16459E3142.description:
Outline how iterative processes inform engineering decisions, improve solutions, and inspire
new ideas.

8EEBB0629F76472680814082AE0D907B.description: Identify the step in which an engineering task would fit in a design process.

C249F0BC22C3486292D3F7C046A15B14.description: Describe major steps of a design process and identify typical tasks involved in each step.

C6A03807794C47B4AFB6653502D219E0.description: Explain that there are many versions of a design process that describe essentially the same process.

A08712CA37E84AA1BD561507FE83C4E1.description: Explain and justify an engineering design process.

951566A3902B49F28C61E51AD379F8A6.description: Design Process: An engineering design process is an iterative, systematic approach to problem solving.

FED21432EA594F8F8CF989411685D40C.description: Describe why persistence is important when identifying a problem and/or pursuing solutions.

FF29A94C31074FC986CED39B729C500C.description: Persevere to solve a problem or achieve a goal.

83D01F8165264D5DB24E7374785BFF87.description: Use praise, setbacks, and feedback to positively influence one’s professional development.

F112F2A3B99E4AE4A97997C1A6695B4A.description: Adapt to varied roles, job responsibilities, schedules, and contexts.

FEE5F508D606490D97E817C4625BA4B6.description: Demonstrate flexibility and adaptability to change.

EE5CFB1C5BA64E719E9142D843AB7604.description: Plan how to gain additional knowledge and learning to accomplish a goal.

3A213805669F457CB25FAD3F44349F7A.description: Plan and use time in pursuit of accomplishing a goal without direct oversight.

0749A8FFC75E47889B454612D41E7D8E.description: Demonstrate independent thinking and self-direction in pursuit of accomplishing a goal.

A9AAFE2B08214A6B90FD82CDC68A0743.description:
Engineering Mindset: Successful engineers exhibit specific personal and professional characteristics that lend themselves to the
creative, collaborative, and solution-driven nature of the profession

347610E0959540378F281C284228BDDC.description: Problem Solving and Process Thinking: Strategic and systematic design and inquiry processes guide the development of an effective solution to the problem.
